bCANVx-w6.memHandModelNotes:
Did not buffer into water b/c canvasback will utilize deep waters. ****Modeling: Primarily aquatic only indicated open water, then accept all Mus except urban that fall within hydro buffer. Amy Silvano 05sept05

Changed flowing and standing buffers from 0m to 9999 (unlimited). MJR 30 January 2008.
